frameDefinitions: An Evaluee, which can be a person or an object, has an amount of acceptability or utilization based on general (often non-aesthetic) desirability.
A Searcher looks all over a Ground in order to find a Sought_entity.
The Quantity of a Collection occurring in a Place has a particular Measure, which is related to the amount generally needed.
A Location is filled or covered with the Theme.
The Quantity of a Collection occurring in a Place has a particular Measure.
A Location is characterized by a high amount of (often goal-oriented)
frameExamples: The newcomers <t>combed</t> the area looking for minerals
There is evidence that volatile materials have always been <t>scarce</t> on the Moon .
The waters of the bay <t>teemed</t> with fish.
Beauty is <t>abundant</t> in a land flowing with snowmelt.
listRoleDefinitions: The person or object that is being evaluated for its desirability.
The time when the Evaluee is judged to be desirable.
The geographic area where an <fen>Evaluee</fen> is considered desirable.
The person who is looking all over the <fen>Ground</fen> for the <fen>Sought_entity</fen>.
The location that the <fen>Searcher</fen> covers in looking for the <fen>Sought_entity</fen>.
The entity that the <fen>Searcher</fen> wants to find.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Searcher</fen> scoures the <fen>Ground</fen>.
The <fen>Collection</fen> whose <fen>Quantity</fen> is under consideration.
The feature of an <fen>Collection</fen> which is under discussion. This role is incorporated by all the lexical units in this frame.
The location in which the <fen>Collection</fen> occurs.
The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Collection</fen> is in the state of having  a particular <fen>Measure</fen> for the <fen>Quantity</fen>.
The <fen>Theme</fen> covers or fills the <fen>Location</fen>.  This role most frequently occurs in a PP Complement headed by with or in.
<fen>Location</fen> is the object or area that the <fen>Theme</fen> fills or covers.  This frame element generally occurs as the External Argument.
The period of time during which the the Abounding_with event occurs.
The <fen>Collection</fen> whose <fen>Quantity</fen> is under consideration.
The feature of an <fen>Collection</fen> which is under discussion. This role is incorporated by all the lexical units in this frame.
The location in which the <fen>Collection</fen> occurs.
The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Collection</fen> is in the state of having  a particular <fen>Measure</fen> for the <fen>Quantity</fen>.
The <fen>Location</fen> where a lot of activity is taking place, or prototypically takes place.
The <fen>Activity</fen> that is conceptually filling the <fen>Location</fen>.
The <fen>Individuals</fen> are engaged in the <fen>Activity</fen>, creating a lively <fen>Location</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Location</fen> is characterized by a lot of activity.
The larger or general area where the <fen>Location</fen> is lively.
listRoleExamples: Electronica is all the rage <fex>in Europe</fex>.
<fex>They</fex> first gained entry into the house of Raja Rao, who resides on the ground floor and ransacked the house for valuables.
I had never really seen much on the bigfoot subject or I would have scoured <fex>the area</fex> for signs and looked for droppings
Coast Guard and Navy ships and aircraft combed the area <fex>for the six aircraft</fex>
The majority of specimens were poorly represented, as judged by the small size of mature plants, the immaturity of thalli or scarceness <fex>in occurrence</fex>.
Northern Pike are plentiful <fex>in Perrault Lake</fex>.
<fex>These days</fex> food is plentiful and easy to get and physical activity is no longer a part of daily life.
The waters of the bay teemed <fex>with fish</fex>.
<fex>The walls</fex> crawled with nanite surveillance probes.
Maggots began to teem <fex>in his black fur</fex>.
<fex>On this side of town</fex> the streets are livelier.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: Rare Book and Special Collections Division
